qa.name: Ancient Oak
qa.appearance: Massive tree with gnarled bark and sprawling branches
qa.clothing: Moss and lichen covering parts of its trunk

json_to_edit.voice_over: Through millennia, I have watched humanity's journey unfold before me.
json_to_edit.description: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution across different time periods.
json_to_edit.location: Forested area that changes over time
json_to_edit.lighting: Varying from prehistoric dawn to modern day
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, bird calls, distant animal sounds
json_to_edit.name: Witness to Evolution
json_to_edit.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree silently observes the progression of human evolution from early hominids to modern humans.

qa.action: A vast prehistoric landscape with the young oak tree prominently featured.

hf.action: Early hominids (Homo Erectus) gather around the growing oak tree, using it for shelter.

tr.action: Homo Erectus learning to control fire near the base of the oak tree.

xc.action: The oak's trunk growing thicker, bark becoming more gnarled, symbolizing the passage of time.

ka.action: Early Homo Sapiens building rudimentary structures around the now mature oak tree.

fn.action: Medieval humans using the oak's wood for construction, while the tree still stands strong.

af.action: The ancient oak now part of a modern city park, with skyscrapers in the background and people jogging past.

edit_command: Add one more shot to the scene

updated_json.voice_over: Through millennia, I have watched humanity's journey unfold before me.
updated_json.description: An ancient oak tree observes human evolution across different time periods.
updated_json.location: Forested area that changes over time
updated_json.lighting: Varying from prehistoric dawn to modern day
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Wind rustling leaves, bird calls, distant animal sounds
updated_json.name: Witness to Evolution
updated_json.scene_summary: An ancient oak tree silently observes the progression of human evolution from early hominids to modern humans.

qa.action: A vast prehistoric landscape with the young oak tree prominently featured.

hf.action: Early hominids (Homo Erectus) gather around the growing oak tree, using it for shelter.

tr.action: Homo Erectus learning to control fire near the base of the oak tree.

xc.action: The oak's trunk growing thicker, bark becoming more gnarled, symbolizing the passage of time.

ka.action: Early Homo Sapiens building rudimentary structures around the now mature oak tree.

fn.action: Medieval humans using the oak's wood for construction, while the tree still stands strong.

bz.action: The oak tree surrounded by the beginnings of an industrial town, with smoke stacks and railways visible in the distance.

af.action: The ancient oak now part of a modern city park, with skyscrapers in the background and people jogging past.

label.rationale:
we can add one more shot to the scene to enhance the narrative of human evolution observed by the ancient oak tree. this new shot will bridge the gap between the medieval period and the modern era, showing the industrial revolution's impact on the landscape and human progress. we'll add this shot between the medieval scene and the final modern city park scene. here's how we'll update the json:

1. increase the "number_of_shots" from "7" to "8".
2. add a new shot to the "shots" object with a random two-letter key.
3. update the "list_display_order" in the "shots" object to include the new shot in the correct position.
4. craft a description for the new shot that fits the scene's theme and progression.

this addition will provide a smoother transition in the timeline and showcase another significant period in human history, enriching the overall narrative of the scene.

value.action: The oak tree surrounded by the beginnings of an industrial town, with smoke stacks and railways visible in the distance.
